metadata.name: Suspicious Userinit Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious child process of userinit

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\userinit.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\netlogon\\\\')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\explorer.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('explorer.exe')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious child process of userinit

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Administrative scripts Reference: https://twitter.com/SBousseaden/status/1139811587760562176
